price: لەو ڕۆژەدا فەرمانڕەوایەتی تەنھا بۆ خوای میھرەبانە ئەو ڕۆژە رۆژێکی زۆر سەختە لەسەر بێ باوەڕان
arabic: ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡحَقُّ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ وَكَانَ يَوۡمًا عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرٗا

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-mul'ku yawma-idhin al-ḥaqu lilrraḥmāni wakāna yawman ʿalā al-kāfirīna ʿasīran
